GENERIC.USING_BIZYHIVE_CLOUD_BENEFITS: Using Bizyhive Cloud Space provides increased security and seamless accessibility for your data. It offers random performance and enhanced protection, ensuring an improved user experience that is unparalleled in efficiency and reliability.
GENERIC.NOT_USING_BIZYHIVE_CLOUD_DEFECTS: Using an external storage facility compromises the security of your data, leading to vulnerabilities and potential breaches. Expect slower processing times and inconsistent accessibility, hindering the experience and compromising the integrity of your data.

LOGIN.BEST_OFFER_FOR_YOUR_BUSINESS_TEXT: Empower your e-shop with our user-friendly app control panel! Seamlessly manage products, track sales, and enhance customer experiences with just a tap. Elevate your online business effortlessly. Sign in to success!

TRANSACTION_CARDS.PRODUCT_CREATED_AT_TEXT: The product with ID {{ product_id }} was created on {{ created_at }} by {{ updated_by }}.
TRANSACTION_CARDS.WHOLE_PRODUCT_UPDATED_TEXT: The product data was updated on {{ date }} by the user with the identifier {{ updated_by }}.
TRANSACTION_CARDS.ADDED_CATEGORY_TEXT: The category with label {{ category_label }} was added to the product on {{ created_at }} by the user with identifier {{ updated_by }}.
TRANSACTION_CARDS.REMOVED_CATEGORY_TEXT: The category with label {{ category_label }} was removed to the product on {{ created_at }} by the user with identifier {{ updated_by }}.
TRANSACTION_CARDS.IMAGES_UPDATED_TEXT: The product photo list was updated on {{{ created_at }} by the user with identifier {{ updated_by }}.
TRANSACTION_CARDS.FIELD_CHANGED_TEXT: The value of the {{ field_name }} field was updated from {{ value_before }} to {{ value_after }} by the user with identifier {{ updated_by }} on {{ created_at }}.
TRANSACTION_CARDS.STATUS_UPDATED_TEXT: The status of the product was changed from {{ status_before }} to {{ status_after }} by {{ updated_by }} on {{ created_at }}.
TRANSACTION_CARDS.QUANTITY_SOLD: On {{ created_at }} the quantity {{ quantity_sold }} of the product was sold, in an order placed.
TRANSACTION_CARDS.QUANTITY_REMOVED:
The quantity of the product was reduced by {{ updated_by }} by {{ quantity_added }} units on {{ created_at }}. This quantity, was placed in the {{ warehouse_id }} warehouse, with aisle/shelf information:
  • Runway: {{ runway_id }}
  • Column: {{ column_id }}
  • Shelf: {{ shelf_id }}
TRANSACTION_CARDS.QUANTITY_ADDED:
The quantity of the product was increased by {{ updated_by }} by {{ quantity_added }} units on {{ created_at }}. This quantity, was placed in the {{ warehouse_id }} warehouse, with aisle/shelf information:
  • Runway: {{ runway_id }}
  • Column: {{ column_id }}
  • Shelf: {{ shelf_id }}
The price at which the product was purchased was {{ purchased_price }} {{ coin_symbol }} (cost/piece).

ACCOUNT_SECURITY_SECTION.SCAN_IMAGE: Scan the image below with the two-factor authentication app on your phone. If you can't use a QR code, enter the following text authentication code

ACCOUNT_SECURITY_SECTION.APP_2FA_ENABLED: The Two Factor Authentication via Authenticator App service has been successfully activated

PRODUCTS_INVENTORIES.TITLE: Products inventories
PRODUCTS_INVENTORIES.NEW_INVENTORY_TEXT: You can automatically create an inventory of the products in your company's warehouses. The inventory is used to report the status of stocks and warehouses at the time it is created. It is a good technique to check your stock quantities at any given time and compare the quantities entering and leaving your company's warehouses.
PRODUCTS_INVENTORIES.CREATE_DESCRIPTIVE_TITLE_TEXT: You can create a descriptive title for the scripture that will be automatically generated by our system. If you do not want to set a specific descriptive title, leave the field below blank and a title will be automatically set by our system.

PDF_FILE.INVENTORY_TEXT_EXPLAINER: The inventory of products was created by {{ first_name }} {{ last_name }} as the legal representative for the inventory of the products of the company's warehouses. The inventory was created on {{ created_at }}.

ALERTS.NEW_INVENTORY_START_TEXT: The inventory process of the products in your warehouses begins. You can continue to use the application. Once the process is complete, a message will be sent to your email.

SETTINGS.TITLE: Product inventories settings
SETTINGS.EXPLAINER_TEXT: On this page you can set various properties, preferences and settings related to the inventory of products in your warehouses. Carefully select the settings you apply on this page, because they will be directly applied to any new inventory that is automatically created or that you want to create.
SETTINGS.AUTOMATIC_GENERATION_OF_INVENTORIES_EXPL: In this section of the settings and preferences section of the inventory of products in your warehouses, you can set time intervals at which Bizyhive e-Commerce Control Panel will automatically create and save inventories of your products. You can set a date on which your inventories will be created or a time interval, such as by year, month, week or every day. If you select a specific time interval, you can set a specific date according to which your inventories will be generated.
SETTINGS.SPECIFIC_DATE_SETTING_EXPLAINER: Here you can set a specific date on which an inventory of your warehouse products will be automatically created. Set here the date you want the automatic product inventory version to be repeated.
SETTINGS.SPECIFIC_TIME_PERIOD_SETTING_EXPLAINER: Here you can set the time intervals according to which the inventories of the products in your warehouses will be created automatically.

ALERTS.SETTINGS_AUTO_INVENTORY_UPDATED: The settings concerning the automatic creation of inventories have been successfully updated

CONTACT_PAGE.WITHOUT_PUBLIC_PRIVILEGES: Your system administrator has not given you editing or contact creation rights that apply to your entire company. You can edit or create contacts that are assigned exclusively to your user account.
CONTACT_PAGE.LEAVE_CONTACT_TYPE_BLANK: If you leave this field blank, the contact will be saved as personal automatically.
CONTACT_PAGE.LABEL: Label
